description: Also called Rapid Eye Movement sleep or REM sleep. "Non-REM sleep" is 非快动眼睡眠. Because it is light sleep, it is also called the peak period for dreaming.

examples.chinese: 在快动眼睡眠阶段做梦
examples.translation: Dreaming during the REM sleep stage

examples.chinese: 睡眠结构中快动眼睡眠占比
examples.translation: The proportion of REM sleep in the sleep structure

examples.chinese: 改善快动眼睡眠的质量
examples.translation: Improve the quality of REM sleep
